name: CreateInterestCategory
description:
Create a new interest category in a Mailchimp list.

This tool is used to create a new interest category for a specified Mailchimp list. It is useful when you want to categorize subscriber interests within a list.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID identifying the Mailchimp list where the interest category will be created.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: category_description
parameters.description: Text description of the interest category. Appears on signup forms, often phrased as a question.

value_schema.description: The text description of this category. This field appears on signup forms and is often phrased as a question.

parameters.name: category_display_type
parameters.description: Determines how the interest category appears on signup forms. Options include: 'checkboxes', 'dropdown', 'radio', or 'hidden'.

value_schema.description: Determines how this category’s interests appear on signup forms.

parameters.name: category_display_order
parameters.description: The numerical order for displaying categories. Lower numbers appear first.

value_schema.description: The order that the categories are displayed in the list. Lower numbers display first.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The text description of this category. This field appears on signup forms and is often phrased as a question.

value_schema.description: The text description of this category. This field appears on signup forms and is often phrased as a question.

parameters.name: display_order
parameters.description: The order that the categories are displayed in the list. Lower numbers display first.

value_schema.description: The order that the categories are displayed in the list. Lower numbers display first.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Determines how this category’s interests appear on signup forms.

value_schema.description: Determines how this category’s interests appear on signup forms.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
